sections.doc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-call-tracking`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-call-tracking-v0.1.md) replaces static phone numbers with dynamically generated phone numbers used for call tracking analytics.

Introduction

amp-call-tracking replaces static phone numbers with dynamically generated phone numbers used for call tracking analytics.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-call-tracking`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-call-tracking-v0.1.md) replaces static phone numbers with dynamically generated phone numbers used for call tracking analytics.

sections.doc_:
An XHR endpoint that returns a JSON response will define the phone number and how the number will be formatted.

Your XHR endpoint needs to follow and implement [CORS Requests in AMP spec](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/master/spec/amp-cors-requests.md).

The following is the JSON response used in the endpoint in this example:

[sourcecode:json]
{
  "phoneNumber": "15559876543",
  "formattedPhoneNumber": "1 (555) 987-6543"
}
[/sourcecode]

Note that `formattedPhoneNumber` is optional. See the [component documentation for more information](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-call-tracking-v0.1.md).

We also need to set a default phone number that will be shown before the endpoint responds. This is done via an `<a>` element inside the `amp-call-tracking` tag.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
An XHR endpoint that returns a JSON response will define the phone number and how the number will be formatted.

Your XHR endpoint needs to follow and implement [CORS Requests in AMP spec](https://github.com/ampproject/amphtml/blob/master/spec/amp-cors-requests.md).

The following is the JSON response used in the endpoint in this example:

```json
{
  "phoneNumber": "15559876543",
  "formattedPhoneNumber": "1 (555) 987-6543"
}
```

Note that `formattedPhoneNumber` is optional. See the [component documentation for more information](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-call-tracking-v0.1.md).

We also need to set a default phone number that will be shown before the endpoint responds. This is done via an `<a>` element inside the `amp-call-tracking` tag.
